mapper.sql: SELECT t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.ISALLOW, t1.RESERVER, t1.RESERVER2, t1.RESERVER3, t1.RESERVER4, t1.UNIRESID, t11.UNIRESNAME, t11.UNIRESTYPE, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.USERROLEID, t21.USERROLENAME, t1.USERROLERESID, t1.USERROLERESNAME FROM T_SRFUSERROLERES t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFUNIRES t11 ON t1.UNIRESID = t11.UNIRESID LEFT JOIN T_SRFUSERROLE t21 ON t1.USERROLEID = t21.USERROLEID

SELECT t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`ISALLOW`, t1.`RESERVER`, t1.`RESERVER2`, t1.`RESERVER3`, t1.`RESERVER4`, t1.`UNIRESID`, t21.`UNIRESNAME`, t21.`UNIRESTYPE`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`USERROLEID`, t11.`USERROLENAME`, t1.`USERROLERESID`, t1.`USERROLERESNAME` FROM `T_SRFUSERROLERES` t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFUSERROLE t11 ON t1.USERROLEID = t11.USERROLEID LEFT JOIN T_SRFUNIRES t21 ON t1.UNIRESID = t21.UNIRESID

SELECT t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.ISALLOW, t1.RESERVER, t1.RESERVER2, t1.RESERVER3, t1.RESERVER4, t1.UNIRESID, t21.UNIRESNAME, t21.UNIRESTYPE, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.USERROLEID, t11.USERROLENAME, t1.USERROLERESID, t1.USERROLERESNAME FROM T_SRFUSERROLERES t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFUSERROLE t11 ON t1.USERROLEID = t11.USERROLEID LEFT JOIN T_SRFUNIRES t21 ON t1.UNIRESID = t21.UNIRESID

SELECT t1.CREATEDATE AS CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN AS CREATEMAN, t1.ISALLOW AS ISALLOW, t1.RESERVER AS RESERVER, t1.RESERVER2 AS RESERVER2, t1.RESERVER3 AS RESERVER3, t1.RESERVER4 AS RESERVER4, t1.UNIRESID AS UNIRESID, t11.UNIRESNAME AS UNIRESNAME, t11.UNIRESTYPE AS UNIRESTYPE, t1.UPDATEDATE AS UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN AS UPDATEMAN, t1.USERROLEID AS USERROLEID, t21.USERROLENAME AS USERROLENAME, t1.USERROLERESID AS USERROLERESID, t1.USERROLERESNAME AS USERROLERESNAME FROM T_SRFUSERROLERES t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFUNIRES t11 ON t1.UNIRESID = t11.UNIRESID LEFT JOIN T_SRFUSERROLE t21 ON t1.USERROLEID = t21.USERROLEID

SELECT t1.CREATEDATE AS CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN AS CREATEMAN, t1.ISALLOW AS ISALLOW, t1.RESERVER AS RESERVER, t1.RESERVER2 AS RESERVER2, t1.RESERVER3 AS RESERVER3, t1.RESERVER4 AS RESERVER4, t1.UNIRESID AS UNIRESID, t11.UNIRESNAME AS UNIRESNAME, t11.UNIRESTYPE AS UNIRESTYPE, t1.UPDATEDATE AS UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN AS UPDATEMAN, t1.USERROLEID AS USERROLEID, t21.USERROLENAME AS USERROLENAME, t1.USERROLERESID AS USERROLERESID, t1.USERROLERESNAME AS USERROLERESNAME FROM T_SRFUSERROLERES t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFUNIRES t11 ON t1.UNIRESID = t11.UNIRESID LEFT JOIN T_SRFUSERROLE t21 ON t1.USERROLEID = t21.USERROLEID

SELECT t1.[CREATEDATE], t1.[CREATEMAN], t1.[ISALLOW], t1.[RESERVER], t1.[RESERVER2], t1.[RESERVER3], t1.[RESERVER4], t1.[UNIRESID], t11.[UNIRESNAME], t11.[UNIRESTYPE], t1.[UPDATEDATE], t1.[UPDATEMAN], t1.[USERROLEID], t21.[USERROLENAME], t1.[USERROLERESID], t1.[USERROLERESNAME] FROM [T_SRFUSERROLERES] t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFUNIRES t11 ON t1.UNIRESID = t11.UNIRESID LEFT JOIN T_SRFUSERROLE t21 ON t1.USERROLEID = t21.USERROLEID
